title: SQL
content:
CREATE TABLE Activity (
      act_id int(11) NOT NULL.
      act_name varchar(20) NOT NULL,
      act_cal int(11) NOT NULL
    );

INSERT INTO Activity(act_id, act_name, act_cal) VALUES
      (1, 'running', 37),
       ....
      (8, 'meditating', 50);
